title: Flock Safety Devices List (Loveland CO Police Department}

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Colorado Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Records related to the department’s Flock Safety system:

Flock networks shared with me Devices List (Please see https://cdn.muckrock.com/foia_files/2022/11/17/CPRA_REQUEST.pdf
https://cdn.muckrock.com/foia_files/2022/11/09/1938_001.pdf as examples of the lists from other jurisdictions.

Please provide records in their original electronic, machine readable format. For example, please provide csv or spreadsheet files where applicable. Please do not redirect me to your transparency portal.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Paul Tepper

title: Public Records Act Request – Location Tracking & Corporate Data Disclosures

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

This is a request under the California Public Records Act (Gov. Code §§ 7922.000 et seq.) 



I request all records from January 1, 2017 to Present relating to the acquisition, use, or receipt of location-tracking or telematics data from corporations, including but not limited to:



Corporate Disclosures
Records of data received from Google, Apple, Verizon (SimpleMobile ), AT&T, T-Mobile ( UltraMobile ), Toyota, GM OnStar, Tesla, or any telematics/fleet vendor.
Include subpoenas, warrants, exigent requests, geofence warrants, tower dumps, and voluntary corporate disclosures.

Communications
Emails, memos, contracts, or policies regarding partnerships with corporations for location-tracking.
Meeting agendas/minutes discussing corporate data-sharing.

Discriminatory/Targeted Use
Any deployment plans, reports, or after-action reviews referencing use of corporate data in:
“Narcotics,” “gang,” “protest,” or “high-crime” investigations.
Any analysis tied to race, ethnicity, religion, or protest activity.


Policies & Proposals
Internal policies or proposals outlining when and how corporate telematics/location data may be requested or used.





Identifiers for Search: Adonis Gaynor , 11/09/1975, phone numbers 213 -392-3314, 424-507-5478 ,VINs/Plates JTDZN3EU9C3154263/6XCF063, device IDs Phone Numbers: 213 -392-3314 Email Addresses: adonisgaynor1@gmail.com IMEI / IMSI / ICCID / MAC . IMEI 356847113266971/IMEI 2 /356847113307791 , ICCID 89148000008530814783. Phone Numbers: 424-507-5478 IMEI / IMSI / ICCID / MAC . fec0:0:0:ffff::1%1 (Unencrypted)  fec0:0:0:ffff::2%1 (Unencrypted) fec0:0:0:ffff::3%1 (Unencrypted) Connectivity (IPv4/IPv6): Disconnected Local Area Connection* 4 Microsoft Wi-Fi Direct Virtual Adapter #5 Physical address (MAC): 66:6e:69:76:e3:a9 Not operational Maximum transmission unit: 1500IPv4 address: 169.254.135.207/16Connectivity (IPv4/IPv6):Disconnected Local Area Connection* 5 Litigation Hold Notice: This request also serves as notice to preserve all responsive records, including metadata.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Mr. adonis gaynor
